title: Design and Manufacture
description: Major manufacturing processes, capabilities, and costs.  Interaction between design, materials and manufacturing process selection.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ME 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and COE 3001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
